article_title: Tea Party challenger impatient with Andy Barr
article_text:
Roger Brill will take on congressman in primary

Brill: Barr has done nothing to cut taxes, spending or debt

Barr touts accomplishments, blames Senate Democrats for blocking bigger changes

article_metadata.news-keywords: politics, republican, gop, tea party, primary, kentucky, ky, lexington, fayette county
article_metadata.description: Roger Brill, a Harrison County Tea Party activist, supported Republican Andy Barr’s first election to the U.S. House in 2012. He believed Barr was a young conservative who could remake Congress. Now, however, Brill fears that Congress has remade Andy Barr. So Brill is taking on Barr in the May 17 Republican primary for the 6th Congressional District.
article_metadata.title: Tea Party challenger impatient with Andy Barr | Lexington Herald-Leader
